Uses of Interface
com.interface21.jdbc.core.SQLExceptionTranslater

Packages that use SQLExceptionTranslater
com.interface21.jdbc.core The classes in this package make JDBC easier to use and reduce the likelihood of common errors.  
com.interface21.jdbc.core.support Classes supporting the com.interface21.jdbc.core package.  
com.interface21.jdbc.object The classes in this package represent RDBMS queries, updates, and stored procedures as threadsafe, reusable objects.  
 

Uses of SQLExceptionTranslater in com.interface21.jdbc.core
 

Classes in com.interface21.jdbc.core that implement SQLExceptionTranslater
 class SQLErrorCodeSQLExceptionTranslater
          Implementation of SQLExceptionTranslator that uses specific vendor codes defined in a configuration file named "sql-error-codes.xml".
 class SQLStateSQLExceptionTranslater
          Implementation of SQLExceptionTranslater that uses the SQLState code in the SQL exception.

          Return the exception translater for this instance.
 SQLExceptionTranslater SQLExceptionTranslaterFactory.getDefaultTranslater(javax.sql.DataSource ds)

Uses of SQLExceptionTranslater in com.interface21.jdbc.core.support
 

Classes in com.interface21.jdbc.core.support that implement SQLExceptionTranslater
 class OracleSQLExceptionTranslater
          Implementation of SQLExceptionTranslator that uses Oracle vendor code, as included in the ORA-nnn methods.
